Class Stream

The base class for representing transmit or receive streams. This class will never be used itself. See TxStream and RxStream.

Inheritance
object
Stream
RxStream
TxStream

Methods

Activate(StreamFlags, long, uint)

Activate the stream to prepare it for read/write operations.

Declaration
public ErrorCode Activate(StreamFlags flags = StreamFlags.None, long timeNs = 0, uint numElems = 0)
Parameters
Type Name Description
StreamFlags flags

Optional stream flags.
long timeNs

Optional activation time in nanoseconds. Only valid when flags includes Pothosware.SoapySDR.StreamFlags.HasTime.
uint numElems

Optional element count for burst control.
Returns
Type Description
ErrorCode

An error code for the stream activation.

Close()

Close the underlying stream.

Declaration
public void Close()

Deactivate(StreamFlags, long)

Deactivate the stream to end read/write operations.

Declaration
public ErrorCode Deactivate(StreamFlags flags = StreamFlags.None, long timeNs = 0)
Parameters
Type Name Description
StreamFlags flags

Optional stream flags.
long timeNs

Optional activation time in nanoseconds. Only valid when flags includes Pothosware.SoapySDR.StreamFlags.HasTime.
Returns
Type Description
ErrorCode

An error code for the stream deactivation.
